modName: Install Workshop Mods with Mod Manager - IWMwMM
summary:
This is a TUTORIAL.
In this tutorial I will show you how to obtain manual control of the
Steam Workshop Skyrim mods, and how to install them with Nexus Mod Manager.
descriptionHtml:
[b] [size=15]What is this?[/size] [/b]

[size=5]This is [b]NO[/b] mod. This is [b]a TUTORIAL[/b].[/size]


[b] [size=15]What does it do?[/size] [/b]

[size=5]Teaches users how to install a Skyrim mod from the Steam Workshop with
Nexus Mod Manager, and how to remove the Workshop influence on that mod.[/size]



[u][size=8]Introduction:[/size][/u]

[size=4]I have come across people who dislike using the Steam Workshop for The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim,
even though it contains great mods that are unavailable from other sources.

Their reasons for avoiding the Steam Workshop are often:
- They do not know how the Workshop works.
- They do not want the mod linked to their Steam account.
- They do not want automatic updates for the mod.
- They want to manage the mod themselves, or with their mod manager.[/size]


[color=blue] [size=4]In this tutorial I will show you how to obtain manual control of the
Steam Workshop Skyrim mods, and how to install them with Nexus Mod Manager.[/size] [/color]



[u][size=8]Tutorial features:[/size][/u]

[list] [*][size=4].PDF format[/size] [/list]
[list] [*][size=4]English language[/size] [/list]
[list] [*][size=4]Step by step guide to a working, independent Workshop mod in Nexus Mod Manager[/size] [/list]
[list] [*][size=4]Choose your way: Multiple paths to reach the goal[/size] [/list]
[list] [*][size=4]Interactive links inside the tutorial for easy navigation[/size] [/list]
[list] [*][size=4]Way too much information[/size] [/list]
[list] [*][size=4]Some unfunny jokes[/size] [/list]
[list] [*][size=4]A Quick Tutorial for advanced users[/size] [/list]
[list] [*][size=4]Tips & Tricks for mod and pc management[/size] [/list]
[list] [*][size=4]Guide to unpacking .bsa files[/size] [/list]
[list] [*][size=4]Troubleshooting guide with FAQ[/size] [/list]

[u][size=8]Also included:[/size][/u]

[list] [*][size=4]Thirty tutorial reference pictures, which depict steps from the tutorial[/size] [/list]
[list] [*][size=4]Two Workshop link shortcuts for your browser, which link to the most used Workshop pages[/size] [/list]
[list] [*][size=4]A .batch file, which (hopefully) finds and opens the Skyrim Data folder for you[/size] [/list]
[list] [*][size=4]A short comic (6 pics...) made by me with Paint.NET and pictures from google, which is just there for the lulz[/size] [/list]


[color=red] [size=5]Please donÂ´t use Nexus Mod Manager to download my tutorial package.
Instead, manual download it [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/download/1000055029][b]here[/b][/url].
Then unpack the package to your desktop
by using an archive program like [url=http://www.7-zip.org/][b]7zip[/b][/url] or [url=http://www.rarlab.com/download.htm][b]Winrar[/b][/url].
To open the .PDF you will need a .pdf reader, like [url=http://get.adobe.com/de/reader/][b]this one[/b][/url].[/size] [/color]

[size=4] Hopefully this will be useful to some of you. :) [/size]
author: Dani - Gruberix
